### Model

LightGBMfeaturescategorical featuresone-hot encodingtree-based models~~1000%~~ensemblebaggingrandom forestboostingGBDTLightGBM`bagging_fraction`random forestsklearnGBDTXGBoostLightGBMXGBoostmemoryLightGBMboostingCatBoostmemory

prototypesklearnrandom forestsklearnbaseline modelkernelssklearnpandas dataframesklearncategorical featuresLabelEncoder/

```python
# Before training.
label_encoders = {}
for col in CAT_FEATURES:
    le = LabelEncoder()
    df[col] = le.fit_transform(df[col])
    label_encoders[col] = le
...
# After training.
for col in CAT_FEATURES:
    df[col] = label_encoders[col].inverse_transform(v[col])
```

LightGBMDataset

```python
train_set = lgb.Dataset(train[FEATURES], train[TARGET], categorical_feature = CAT_FEATURES)
```

Post.title: Guava Quick Notes
Post.content:
GuavaJavajava8-tutorialJavaJavaLeetcodeGuava
Guava

Using/avoiding null

nullnull

  • nullSet/Mapkey -> null
  • nullMapvalue -> Setvaluenullkey
  • null ->

Map.get(key)nullkeykeyvaluenullreadabilityshort$\neq$simple

Optional<T>RESTfulr(hard to misuse)

Ordering

Orderingfluent comparatorJava 8Comparator
BookListnameyear

chainingcomparing/thenComparingBooknamecomparing/thenComparingOrderingOrderingOrdering

Immutable Collection

immurtableGuavaImmutable Collection

ImmutableList and unmodifiableList

The immutability is only applied to the amount and references of the objects in the Collection, and does not address the mutability of objects you put in the Collection.

graph LR
                subgraph Books
                book1-->book2
                end
                book1-->Object[Book1 Object]
                immutableBooks-->book1

C++book1book2constbook1Bookbook1GuavaImmutable Collectionconst
ImmutableListUnmodifiableListwrapper

auto@AutoValue:

Immutable Collectionthread safety() memory efficientMap

Others

  • PeekingIteratorpeek()
  • Cacheevictionsizetimereference-based eviction
  • Rangepair<int, int>
